contentList.content: You can channel cosmic forces of Good. Once per battle, when you or an ally are attacked, you can grant the target <LSTag Tooltip="Resistant">Resistance</LSTag> to Slashing, Piercing, and Bludgeoning damage and increase their <LSTag Tooltip="ArmourClass">Armour Class</LSTag> by 1 for the rest of the turn. You can use this feature a number of times equal to your <LSTag Tooltip="ProficiencyBonus">Proficiency Bonus</LSTag>, and regain all uses on a <LSTag Tooltip="LongRest">Long Rest</LSTag>.

You can channel cosmic forces of Evil. Once per battle, if you damage a creature, you can also deal an additional [1] and you regain [2]. You add your <LSTag Tooltip="Proficiency">Proficiency Bonus</LSTag> to these damage and healing rolls. You can use this feature a number of times equal to your <LSTag Tooltip="ProficiencyBonus">Proficiency Bonus</LSTag>, and regain all uses on a <LSTag Tooltip="LongRest">Long Rest</LSTag>.

You can channel cosmic forces of Order. Once per turn, if you damage a creature, you can also deal an additional [1] and possibly <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="RESTRAINED">restrain</LSTag> it. You can use this feature a number of times equal to your <LSTag Tooltip="ProficiencyBonus">Proficiency Bonus</LSTag>, and regain all uses on a <LSTag Tooltip="LongRest">Long Rest</LSTag>.

You can channel cosmic forces of Chaos. Once per turn, if you damage a creature, you can also deal an additional [1] and possibly <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="RESTRAINED">restrain</LSTag> it. You can use this feature a number of times equal to your <LSTag Tooltip="ProficiencyBonus">Proficiency Bonus</LSTag>, and regain all uses on a <LSTag Tooltip="LongRest">Long Rest</LSTag>.

You have spent significant time in the Outlands. You gain the planar <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_Paitm_MistyStep">Misty Step</LSTag> spell to teleport and the <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_Paitm_Tongues">Tongues</LSTag> spell for conversations. Each spell can be used once per <LSTag Tooltip="ShortRest">Short Rest</LSTag>.
The number of uses you have of your Planar Agent reaction.

As a Righteous Heritor, once per turn, when you or an ally are attacked, you can grant the target <LSTag Tooltip="Resistant">Resistance</LSTag> to Slashing, Piercing, and Bludgeoning damage and increase their <LSTag Tooltip="ArmourClass">Armour Class</LSTag> by 1 for the rest of the turn. You can use this feature a number of times equal to your <LSTag Tooltip="ProficiencyBonus">Proficiency Bonus</LSTag>, and regain all uses on a <LSTag Tooltip="LongRest">Long Rest</LSTag>.

As a Baleful Scion, once per turn, if you damage a creature, you can also deal an additional [1] and you regain [2]. You add your <LSTag Tooltip="Proficiency">Proficiency Bonus</LSTag> to these damage and healing rolls. You can use this feature a number of times equal to your <LSTag Tooltip="ProficiencyBonus">Proficiency Bonus</LSTag>, and regain all uses on a <LSTag Tooltip="LongRest">Long Rest</LSTag>.

As an Agent of Order, once per turn, if you damage a creature, you can also deal an additional [1] and possibly <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="RESTRAINED">restrain</LSTag> it. You can use this feature a number of times equal to your <LSTag Tooltip="ProficiencyBonus">Proficiency Bonus</LSTag>, and regain all uses on a <LSTag Tooltip="LongRest">Long Rest</LSTag>.

As an Agent of Chaos, once per turn, on a <LSTag Tooltip="CriticalHit">Critical Hit</LSTag> or Critical Miss with an <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Roll</LSTag>, you can randomly gain a chaotic effect for the current turn. You can use this feature a number of times equal to your <LSTag Tooltip="ProficiencyBonus">Proficiency Bonus</LSTag>, and regain all uses on a <LSTag Tooltip="LongRest">Long Rest</LSTag>.
